Object Fit

# Object Fit

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                     | Support     |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
object-contain
```    | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
object-cover
```      | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
object-fill
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
object-none
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
object-scale-down
``` | 🌐 Web only |

## Contributors

We are looking for contributors for the following:

### Add `object-fit`

`object-fit` was added in React Native 0.71
